content.rendered: Yamazaki’s annual cask releases a no age statement single malt whisky which was the first release, launched back in late 2009. Matured solely in sherry casks for around 12-15 years.

excerpt.rendered:
Distillery Yamazaki
Vintage 2009
Whisky Origin Japan
Region Japan
ABV 48%
Bottle Size 70cl
